title: Claim Credit for Other Dependents
description: A taxpayer is supporting their elderly parent who lives with them and wants to claim them as a dependent.

tasks.description: Verify that the parent meets the criteria to be a qualifying relative.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the parent meets the gross income and support tests.

tasks.description: Add the parent as a dependent on the tax return.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly enters the parent's information.

tasks.description: Claim the non-refundable Credit for Other Dependents.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly applies the credit to the taxpayer's return.
